aboutMe.title: About me
aboutMe.description:
I'm a Fullstack Web Developer based in Ryazan, Russia. 
 I have 3 years of professional website development experience. 
 I have acquired the skills necessary to build great and premium applications.

biography.block: Hello, I am fullstack web developer based in Russia!
biography.title: Jesper Nielsen

personalSkills.title: My personal skills
personalSkills.description:
• Communication. I will always find a common language with any person
  • Teamwork. I work well in a team, I also have leadership skills
  • Speed. I always complete everything exactly on time.

professionalSkills.title: My stack
professionalSkills.description: I have knowledge in 4 programming languages: Python, PHP, JavaScript, TypeScript

testimonials.title: Testimonials
testimonials.rodionVikolTestimonial: Most people just talk about it when they have a problem, but Kirill is not like that. I like that along with the occurrence of a problem, he suggests a way to solve it. I think this is one of the important skills
testimonials.andrewAnanievTestimonial: Our work with Kirill is productive. In a short time, he created a project from scratch according to a given technical task and still supports it
testimonials.danielWilsonTestimonial: Kirill is very pleasant to work with, he works great in a team, it is very easy to interact with him
testimonials.andrewBlightTestimonial: Kirill is a competent developer, he has high leadership skills, and he also manages the team perfectly

contact.title: If you want to work with me, you can write to me on telegram
